name: Never Look Back
description:
Comments

This was made for the AAU JAM Fall game jam, where the theme was "One rule".  The rule for our game is very simple, as you are not allowed to look back from the way you came. You will have to navigate through a house, and through trial and error, find the way to freedom. Be quick, however, as the more you linger, the closer he comes...

Assets

Image for ending screen

Image of the “monster” thanks to Julius Ebenau Winther
